title: 891sqft 1BR 1BA - Walk To Downtown - Get 1 Month Rent Off!

From $3,730/mo', '* Unit 332 - Available 08/23/22', '* Unit 418 - Available 09/01/22', '* Unit 317 - Available 09/03/22', 'Incredibly walkable, award-winning living at the Metropolitan in San Mateo.', 'Incredibly walkable, award-winning living at the Metropolitan in San Mateo.', 'Receive a stylish kitchen and more when you rent this two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment now available at Metropolitan.', 'The kitchen of this home acts as a centerpiece to the spacious, open layout.', 'The shine of the stainless steel meets the solid, earth tones of the granite countertops.', 'Explore the living area and step onto the private patio for a breath of fresh air and to enjoy views of the meticulously manicured neighborhood grounds.', 'Those grounds might just call you outside.', 'Walk along the winding pathways and make you way to the open-air, heated lap pool.', 'Talk with neighbors and enjoy a barbecue beside the pool.', 'Within the neighbor clubhouse, you have access to a chef’s kitchen, sixteen-seat movie theater, and steam saunas.', 'Contact a friendly team member today to learn more about move-in specials and this model’s availability!', 'FLOORPLAN/UNIT AMENITIES:', '* Large Patio/Balcony * Location -
